critique: This document is an executive order that designates the Bureau of Reclamation as an agency of the Government included within the definition of the term "Department" for the purposes of Title I of the Renegotiation Act of 1951. This act likely deals with government contracts and oversight. There is not enough information to determine the ideological tilt, immigration approach, executive power, federalism, national security vs. civil liberties, or social inclusion. However, it seems to be related to economic regulation.
